episode_summary: In this episode, Jeremy Hurewitz shares insights from the world of espionage to enhance communication and sales skills. He discusses techniques like mirroring, empathy, and elicitation to build rapport and understand client needs. These strategies are particularly useful for real estate agents looking to improve client interactions and close more deals.
